comment: Added ON DELETE RESTRICT constraint to flights table
Added viewEASA for EASA logbook like display
Added Diamond Aircraft to aircraft table
Added icao/iata codes for Boeing in aircraft table
Added autoincrement for flights, pilots and tails tables
changed column tDual to tDUAL in table flights for consistency in naming
changed column id to flight_id in table flights for consistency in naming
added viewDefault as a copy of Logbook (deprecated)
added viewQCompleter as a copy of QCompleterView (deprecated)
reworked views to display self or picname according CASE
Reworked viewEASA to incorporate NULL handling
Edited tails and aircraft tables - engineClass and weightClass instead of columns for each element
